text: Only a couple days away from race day! We need only $200 to hit $2500 raised for the L&LS!  Please help: http://t.co/ukE7m2w via @addthis
Help me raise money for the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society to help them fight blood cancer.  Visit my page: http://t.co/FAMiCDg via @addthis
Two weeks of tapering until the San Diego Rock 'n' Roll marathon...can't wait!
I've run 286 miles training for the Rock 'n' Roll San Diego Marathon, trying to raise $$ for the L&LS http://bit.ly/mdMnns via @FirstGiving
20 miles in 2hrs 35min...jeez, I didn't think I would make it!
So far we're at about $1900 raised for the L&LS.  Please support my fundraiser and please retweet1     http://bit.ly/gPqJJ5 via @FirstGiving
16 mile run in 2:02, followed by a nap and watching a little golf w/ the Pops...Great Sunday!
Please RT and support me in raising money for the L&LS as I train for Rock 'n' Roll San Diego Marathon http://bit.ly/ehWBpq via @FirstGiving
A glass of red wine and some dark chocolate after a long, difficult work day :)
Thanks @Octavious_Ponce, @balancedspoon, and @kittenfire! I found out afterwords I was supposed to run 12 mi. and not 9....oh well!
I can't believe I'm 1/2 way thru my marathon training! Please support me as I raise money for the L&LS http://bit.ly/hEsZry via @FirstGiving
9 miles in 1hr 1min...my  new best!
Ugh, I hate getting sick in the middle of training!  Although, unless I have a fever, I'm still going to run! :)
Rock 'n' Roll San Diego Marathon http://bit.ly/i0RNnq via @FirstGiving
Alright, 13 mile run in the rain...lets do it!
Hopefully the rain will stay away so that I can get my 9 mile run in outside!
I think I'm finally overcoming this stupid snowboarding injury...still not back to my normal pace though :-\
Woops!  I meant 12 "miles" in 1 hour 30 min...wow! Thanks @Brooklynator!
12 hours in 1 hour 30 min....what a beautiful day it is today!
Getting ready for a 12 mile run in about an hour! Not sure how I'll hold up after being injured snowboarding last weekend :-\
Up to $1,750 now!  Thanks Uncle Paul! http://www.firstgiving.com/fundraiser/richard-flask/rock-n-roll-san-diego-marathon
Man I'm hurting from snowboarding...definitely making training hard!
Awesome weekend of snowboarding in Mammoth, but man am I sore! Time to get back on the running schedule!
Almost 1/3 of the way there!!! Keep rockin' people!!! :-) http://www.firstgiving.com/fundraiser/richard-flask/rock-n-roll-san-diego-marathon
We've passed the $1,400 mark! Thanks for everyone's help! http://www.firstgiving.com/fundraiser/richard-flask/rock-n-roll-san-diego-marathon
Perfect cool and sunny SoCal Sunday for a run!  First things first...a little coffee cereal to get things rolling!
Time to rest before my 10 miler tomorrow...I'm hoping to keep it at around a 7min/mile pace....we'll see!
A nice 8 mile run to finish off the weekend...I love it :)
I'm about 1/4 of the way there...I need your help! http://www.firstgiving.com/fundraiser/richard-flask/rock-n-roll-san-diego-marathon
Sounds good @midpackrunner...I'm very interested!
Ran my fastest 5 mile run...Great way to start training! http://www.firstgiving.com/fundraiser/richard-flask/rock-n-roll-san-diego-marathon
That sounds awesome @midpackrunner.  Any special recipes or instructions??
What are the best energy gels out there that everyone uses?  I've used Gu for my last 2 marathons, but I'm looking for something new & good!
I had an awesome 6-mile run tonight! Gotta love running in this beautiful Southern California weather!
With training starting on Monday, please support the LLS! http://www.firstgiving.com/fundraiser/richard-flask/rock-n-roll-san-diego-marathon
Thanks for following @BartYasso! I appreciate your support!
Wearing orange @powerbalance band for Leukemia till Jun5! http://www.firstgiving.com/fundraiser/richard-flask/rock-n-roll-san-diego-marathon
Can't sleep past 6:30am! I guess it's time to run then! A short 4 mile run today, a 6 mile run tomorrow, and then training starts on Monday!
Thanks listing me @RunNessieRun! I appreciate your support for the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society! :) Keep rockin'!
@ForrestGump49er They're by far the lightest and best shoes I've tried out! I haven't had shin splits once since running on them!
Up to $950 in 10 days of fundraising...on my way to my goal of $5000 for the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society!  Thanks for everyone's support!!
For those interested, check out @brooksrunning for awesome running shoes! I run on their Ghost3 model...it's like running on air!
Please continue to help spread the word! Retweet my link! http://www.firstgiving.com/fundraiser/richard-flask/rock-n-roll-san-diego-marathon
I had a nice 6 mile run yesterday w/ no problems...I'm blessed to be healthy! I'm feeling pretty excited about starting training next week!
Over $300 raised in the first week of fundraising!  Thank you to everyone who helped!  Now, lets keep this momentum going!
http://www.firstgiving.com/fundraiser/richard-flask/rock-n-roll-san-diego-marathon
Running's never felt better than being able to train for a great cause! I hope I have your support! Please donate at my fundraiser page!
http://www.firstgiving.com/fundraiser/richard-flask/rock-n-roll-san-diego-marathon
